content.question: In line 1, the phrase cenabis bene, mi Fabulle is translated

choices.label: Fabullus and I have dined well
You will dine well, my Fabullus

content.answer: You will dine well, my Fabullus

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
